platform.description: defines the processing platform of the data resource. a data resource is something that holds data of a defined structure. SQL Tables and Views are good examples, but this is in essence open-ended, like for instance a Kafka topic with an Avro Schema.

fqn.description: the Fully Qualified Name of the data resource on the platform.

id.description: An arbitrary but unique identifier for the platform. This matches the id from the PACE app configuration.
